title: The Germination and growth of plants
creator_credit: Peter Boulton, Educational Foundation for Visual Aids and Boulton-Hawker Films
brief_description: Explains the origins of fruits, the general structure of seeds and through simple classroom experiments, the conditions necessary for germination. Examines hypogeal and epigeal germination and presents the early development of seedlings using time lapse techniques following root system development and shoot growth. Accompanied by an 8p. Study Guide.
